meaningMnemonic: If it's in your <kanji>nature</kanji> to <kanji>ridicule</kanji> people, it will become a <vocabulary>chronic</vocabulary> problem. You can't change something that's so embedded in who you are, which is a shame, since you're a jerk.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
